remarks: Commutative/associative law for vector addition.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvgcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvgcl.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvadd32 $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G C ) = ( ( A G C ) G B ) ) $.
